topic: joint statement on the trilateral meeting between the governments of the united states of america, the state of israel, and the syrian arab republic

text: The governments of the United States of America, the State of Israel, and the Syrian Arab Republic have issued a joint statement following a trilateral meeting.
The meeting, which took place on January 07, 2026, aimed to address various regional and international issues of mutual concern.
According to the statement, the three governments discussed ways to enhance cooperation and promote stability in the region,
while also reaffirming their commitment to upholding international law and respecting the sovereignty of all nations.
The statement did not provide further details on the specific topics discussed or any agreements reached during the meeting,
but emphasized the importance of continued dialogue and diplomacy in promoting peace and understanding among the three nations.
